---
category: news
title: "AI and computer vision remove the need for cell biopsy in testing embryos"
excerpt: "Despite continuing controversies over its value in improving birth rates in IVF, testing embryos for their chromosomal content has become routine in many fertility clinics. Embryos with a normal complement of chromosomes (known as \"euploid\") are known to have a good chance of implanting in the uterus to become a pregnancy,"
